value:
Order of Heroes—hmm, I bet that's
just a fancy label for a group of
assassins.

My liege is Lady Camilla. She took
me under her wing. So I'm going
to protect her at all costs.

I'll always follow your instructions in
a mission. I can read your lips from
all the way across the battlefield.

I need the strongest weapon I can
get, but I don't know what that is in
this realm. Keep your eyes peeled.

I keep my weapons in top shape.
So don't sneak up on me while
I'm sharpening them, all right?

I'm on a mission to deliver a
critical message. Hello...
from $Nf.$k$pMission complete.
To face me is death.
Time for a new objective...
More power? Good. I'll need it.

I'm Beruka, an assassin from Nohr.
Need me for some missions?
Fine. I'll take the job.

$Nu...
I am glad to see you are still alive.$k$pWhy am I glad? ...I don't know.$k$pI am not obligated to you. You
are not my liege—we have no
contractual arrangement.$k$pHowever, I...worry about your
well-being. Presumably because
of your irreplaceable abilities.$k$pAssassins like myself do not get
emotionally attached, so I'm sure
it's your abilities that concern me.

Need something? Then state it. I can execute any mission.
Name a target. Any target. Until then, I'll be here—getting ready.
I never hold back on the battlefield. I give all. And I take all.
I don't waste time when taking out a target. So, surprise attacks. And poison if I have it.
This realm... These people... It's too bright, all of it.
Where is Lady Camilla? I've got to keep her safe at all costs.
You take to the battlefield with a nonlethal weapon. Hmm.
